item.title: Katie add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "The truth is rarely pure and never simple." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Katie add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "Until I feared I would lose it, I never loved to read. One does not love breathing." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Katie add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "I wanted you to see what real courage is, instead of getting the idea that courage is a man with a gun in his hand. It's when you know you're licked before you begin, but you begin anyway and see it through no matter what. - Atticus Finch" -- Harper Lee

item.title: Katie add a quote by Lois Lowry
item.description: "It's the choosing that's important, isn't it?" -- Lois Lowry

item.title: Katie add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "Real courage is when you know you're licked before you begin, but you begin anyway and see it through no matter what." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Katie add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "I'm not a teacher: only a fellow traveler of whom you asked the way. I pointed ahead - ahead of myself as well as you." -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Katie add a quote by B.B. King
item.description: "The beautiful thing about learning is that nobody can take it away from you." -- B.B. King

item.title: Katie add a quote by Laurie Anderson
item.description: "Literature is the safe and traditional vehicle through which we learn about the world and pass on values from on generation to the next. Books save lives." -- Laurie Anderson

item.title: Katie add a quote by Ann Voskamp
item.description: "Practice is the hardest part of learning, and training is the essence of transformation." -- Ann Voskamp

item.title: Katie add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Teaching is only demonstrating that it is possible. Learning is making it possible for yourself." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Katie add a quote by Natalie Portman
item.description: "I don't love studying. I hate studying. I like learning. Learning is beautiful." -- Natalie Portman

item.title: Katie add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If ever there is tomorrow when we're not together... there is something you must always remember. You are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think. But the most important thing is, even if we're apart... I'll always be with you." -- A.A. Milne
